definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
Dombra or Tambura, Kazakh plucked lute
sihu (or "khuurchir" in Mongolian), a bowed instrument with four strings, primarily associated with Mongolian and Chinese culture
sanxian, large family of 3-stringed plucked musical instruments, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and long neck, used in folk music, opera and Chinese orchestra
bawu, a free reed wind instrument shaped like a flute and played transversally, associated particularly with minority cultures of Yunnan
ocarina/wind instrument consisting of an egg-shaped chamber with holes
muqam, Uyghur melody types that are the basis for a set of suites
